The NIH Office of Data Science Strategy (ODSS) launches the **[Advancing Health Research through Ethical, Multimodal AI Initiative](https://datascience.nih.gov/artificial-intelligence/MultimodalAI)**, a call for applications to foster ethically aligned, data-driven AI research in biology, behavior, and health.

**Key Dates:**

- Register for the webinar: April 19, 2024, 2:00-3:00pm ET  
- Letter of Intent Due: April 29, 2024, by 5:00pm local time  
- Full Proposal Due: May 16, 2024, by 5:00pm local time  

Direct inquiries to: [ODMultimodalAI@od.nih.gov](mailto:ODMultimodalAI@od.nih.gov)

This initiative aims to develop new AI approaches for modeling and understanding complex systems to improve disease detection and treatment. Don't miss out on contributing to this groundbreaking research effort.

For complete details, view the [Research Opportunity Announcement](https://datascience.nih.gov/artificial-intelligence/MultimodalAI).
